item.title: Ulli Frotscher
item.description: as a dinosaur, started with turbo-pascal, fortran and assembler in the 80th, have experiences in some of the areas from design and coding over quality to agile methodologies and product ownership

item.title: Usman Malik
item.description: Bringing over 15 years of experience, I possess deep expertise in Linux/UNIX/NIX, IT Security, and DevOps with a keen focus on Cloud Native technologies and Kubernetes.
